text: Alireza Nikmehr (, born 1972 in Tabriz — died 2003 in Tabriz) was an Iranian footballer who played for Tractor as a goalkeeper.پنج پزشک پا به توپ فوتبال ایران (Varzesh3) ==References== Category:1972 births Category:2003 deaths Category:Iranian Azerbaijani sportspeople Category:Sportspeople from Tabriz Category:Iranian footballers Category:Tractor S.C. players Category:Tabriz University of Medical Sciences alumni Category:Association football goalkeepers
title: Alireza Nikmehr
